verses.text: \w So|strong="H3588"\w* \w these|strong="H1931"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w men|strong="H6662"\w* \w stopped|strong="H7673"\w* \w answering|strong="H6030"\w* Job, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w in|strong="H5869"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w own|strong="H5869"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.

\w This|strong="H1121"\w* \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* anger \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Elihu \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Barachel|strong="H1292"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Buzite, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ram|strong="H7410"\w*. \w He|strong="H5921"\w* \w burned|strong="H2734"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* anger \w against|strong="H5921"\w* Job \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w justifying|strong="H6663"\w* \w himself|strong="H5315"\w* rather \w than|strong="H5921"\w* God,

\w and|strong="H7969"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w burned|strong="H2734"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* anger \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Job|strong="H3808"\w*’s \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w friends|strong="H7453"\w* \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w had|strong="H4672"\w* \w failed|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* refute \w Job|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H7969"\w* \w yet|strong="H3808"\w* \w had|strong="H4672"\w* \w condemned|strong="H7561"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3117"\w* Elihu \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w waited|strong="H2442"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w speak|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* Job \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w others|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H3117"\w* \w older|strong="H2205"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* men \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w no|strong="H7200"\w* \w further|strong="H4617"\w* \w reply|strong="H6310"\w*, \w his|strong="H7200"\w* anger \w was|strong="H6310"\w* \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3651"\w* Elihu \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Barachel|strong="H1292"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Buzite declared: “\w I|strong="H3117"\w* am \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w years|strong="H3117"\w*, \w while|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*; \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w why|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w was|strong="H3117"\w* timid \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w tell|strong="H2331"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w what|strong="H3372"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w know|strong="H1843"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w thought|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w age|strong="H3117"\w* \w should|strong="H8141"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w many|strong="H7230"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w should|strong="H8141"\w* \w teach|strong="H3045"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1931"\w* there \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w in|strong="H7307"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man, \w the|strong="H1931"\w* \w breath|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H1931"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w*, \w that|strong="H1931"\w* gives \w him|strong="H1931"\w* understanding.

\w It|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H4941"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* only \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w old|strong="H2205"\w* \w who|strong="H7227"\w* \w are|strong="H7227"\w* \w wise|strong="H2449"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* elderly \w who|strong="H7227"\w* understand \w justice|strong="H4941"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* say, ‘\w Listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H8085"\w*; \w I|strong="H3651"\w* too \w will|strong="H8085"\w* \w declare|strong="H2331"\w* \w what|strong="H1843"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w know|strong="H1843"\w*.’

\w Indeed|strong="H2005"\w*, \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w waited|strong="H3176"\w* \w while|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1697"\w*; \w I|strong="H2005"\w* listened \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w your|strong="H5704"\w* reasoning; \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w searched|strong="H2713"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*,

\w I|strong="H5704"\w* paid \w you|strong="H5704"\w* full attention. \w But|strong="H6030"\w* \w no|strong="H4480"\w* \w one|strong="H4480"\w* proved Job wrong; \w not|strong="H5704"\w* \w one|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* rebutted \w his|strong="H4480"\w* arguments.

\w So|strong="H6435"\w* do \w not|strong="H3808"\w* claim, ‘\w We|strong="H6435"\w* \w have|strong="H4672"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*; \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H2451"\w*, refute \w him|strong="H4672"\w*.’

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w Job|strong="H3808"\w* has \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w directed|strong="H6186"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w words|strong="H4405"\w* \w against|strong="H6186"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w answer|strong="H7725"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w* \w with|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* arguments.

\w Job|strong="H3808"\w*’s friends \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w dismayed|strong="H2865"\w*, \w with|strong="H6030"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w to|strong="H6030"\w* \w say|strong="H4405"\w*; \w words|strong="H4405"\w* \w have|strong="H4405"\w* escaped \w them|strong="H1992"\w*.

\w Must|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w wait|strong="H3176"\w*, \w now|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H5975"\w* silent, \w now|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H5750"\w* \w reply|strong="H6030"\w*?
\w I|strong="H1843"\w* too will \w answer|strong="H6030"\w*; yes, \w I|strong="H1843"\w* will \w declare|strong="H2331"\w* \w what|strong="H1843"\w* \w I|strong="H1843"\w* \w know|strong="H1843"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w full|strong="H4390"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w words|strong="H4405"\w*, \w and|strong="H7307"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* within \w me|strong="H3588"\w* compels \w me|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w my|strong="H6605"\w* belly \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w unvented|strong="H3808"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*; \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w about|strong="H2009"\w* \w to|strong="H3808"\w* \w burst|strong="H1234"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w new|strong="H2319"\w* wineskin.

I must \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w and|strong="H6030"\w* find \w relief|strong="H7304"\w*; I must \w open|strong="H6605"\w* \w my|strong="H6605"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w respond|strong="H6030"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w partial|strong="H5375"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w flatter|strong="H3655"\w* \w any|strong="H5375"\w* \w man|strong="H5375"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w how|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w flatter|strong="H3655"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* \w Maker|strong="H6213"\w* \w would|strong="H6213"\w* remove \w me|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w an|strong="H6213"\w* instant.
